annotation_sentence: Well, I’ve always admired your company’s commitment to innovation and sustainability.

annotation_sentence: In my last role, I led a team to streamline our supply chain process.

annotation_sentence: We faced several unexpected delays, but by implementing new software and revising our logistics strategy, we reduced delivery times by 20%.
